title: Best of The Program | Guests: Rep. Michael McCaul & Spencer Lindquist | 8/4/21
description:
Glenn, Stu, and Pat discuss New York Gov. Andrew Cuomo’s sexual harassment accusations. Stu goes through the report in detail and shares what he thinks is the worst accusation. Rep. Michael McCaul joins to discuss a new report that found some suspicious activity from the Wuhan lab. The Federalist’s Spencer Lindquist calls in to discuss his article exposing the Left’s pedophilia problem.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
